reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 92/14: GOVERNANCE OF THE CORPORATION
reg_info.act_under: Ontario Underground Infrastructure Notification System Act, 2012

content.content: 1. Each member of the Corporation and the Corporation shall comply with and be bound by Schedule 2 to By-Law no. 2 of the Corporation dated February 10, 2014 and posted on the Corporation’s website. O. Reg. 92/14, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Each member of the Corporation and the Corporation shall comply with and be bound by Schedule 2 to By-Law no. 2 of the Corporation dated February 10, 2014 and posted on the Corporation’s website. O. Reg. 92/14, s. 1.

content.content: 2. The amount of $10,000 is prescribed as the amount of the fine mentioned in section 8 of the Act. O. Reg. 92/14, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. The amount of $10,000 is prescribed as the amount of the fine mentioned in section 8 of the Act. O. Reg. 92/14, s. 2.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 92/14, s. 3.   Français
content.raw_html:
3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 92/14, s. 3.
